meta.title: StadiaIcons – {0} – Shortcut
meta.description: This page will allow you to install {0} as a Progressive Web App with its corresponding StadiaIcon.
meta.keywords: Stadia, Icons, Design, Gaming, Game, Shortcut{0}

installed.title: Installation Successful
installed.info: You should now be able to open {0} directly from your Desktop or Start Menu.

installPrompt.prompt: Create a shortcut on your device.
installPrompt.promptTitleAttr: Install this shortcut as a Progressive Web App on your device.
installPrompt.warning1: Unfortunately the icons for this game is not yet available.
installPrompt.warning2: You can still install the shortcut, but it will have a default icon for the time being.
installPrompt.toggleTitleAttr: Toggle between two icon design styles.
installPrompt.accountTitleAttr: Select a Google account to target when opening shortcuts.
installPrompt.variantTitleAttr: Select an icon variant to use.

popupPrompt.title: First Installation
popupPrompt.inset1: This is the first time you are installing a StadiaIcons shortcut.
popupPrompt.inset2: In order to create shortcuts, you must authorize this website to display popup windows*.
popupPrompt.inset3: Depending on your browser, you should see a message requesting this authorization. It is typically to the right of the address bar.
popupPrompt.request: If you do not see this message or once you have given authorization, please press this button:
popupPrompt.footnote: * StadiaIcon shortcuts use Progressive Web Apps, and in order to open your game without the address bar at the top, the app instead opens the game in a regular browser tab using a popup and immediately closes in the background.

uninstall.info: You pressed the {0} key while the shortcut was launching.
uninstall.uninstall: You may be trying to uninstall this shortcut. If that is the case, you should find an uninstall button in this window's settings. This menu is typically located in the top right.
uninstall.restart: If not, you can simply press this button to start your game:

unavailable.status: Your browser may not be supported
unavailable.browsers: We strongly recommend using {0}Download Chrome{1} or {2}Download Edge{3}.

exists.status: The shortcut may already be installed
exists.info: If you have already installed the {0} {1} shortcut, you no longer need to access this link; simply use the installed shortcut to play your game!
exists.fallback: Otherwise, something didn't go as planned; we suggest you reload this page to see if things get fixed.

accountSelector.title: Select your Google Account ID
accountSelector.info: This corresponds to the position of your Google account in the list of connected accounts.{0}Check the bubble in the top-right corner of {1} to see this list.
accountSelector.confirm: In order to store your account ID, this will register the number you have picked as a cookie in your browser. It will not be used for tracking purposes.
accountSelector.confirmButtonTitleAttr: Save your prefered Googla account ID as a Cookie.

alert.info: To uninstall this shortcut, please press the {0} key as the shortcut launches.

home.metaDescription: Install shortcuts for Stadia games to your desktop with corresponding StadiaIcons!
home.title: Welcome to {0}!
home.iconsDescription: {0} is a set of game icons designed with {1} in mind. Each icon follows a simple design principle inspired by the Stadia logo and colors.
home.shortcutsDescription: As for {0}, it allows you to easily add individual Stadia game shortcuts with their corresponding {1} to your devices in just a few clicks.
home.howInfo: It's really quite simple: select a Stadia game you want to install from the list below and we'll guide you through the process.

error.description: There was an error processing your {0} request.
error.instructions: Please close this page and try again. If the problem persists, please contact us on Reddit at {0} or on {1}.
error.title: Error {0}:
error.cta: {0}Click Here{1} to return to the home page.

head.title: StadiaIcons – Error {0}
head.description: There was an error loading this page: Error {0}, {1}

popupTest.request: Please do not close it yourself.

head.title: Popup Test
head.description: This page is used to test for popup authorization.

footer.coffeeTitleAttr: Send me tips using Buy me a Coffee!

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.whatText: This website is built on {0}Google's Firebase platform{1} and uses Firebase Hosting and Firebase Functions. As a result, your IP address will be stored for a couple of months to avoid misuse of the platform.
privacy.whatLink: You can learn more at {0}this link{1}.
privacy.cookiesText: Though we love cookies {0}, we much prefer croissants {1}... So we don't store any cookies, don't worry!
privacy.cookiesText2: {0}Update 02/2022:{1} The option to select a target Google Account has been added and will store this value as a cookie. This cookie is not used for tracking and you will be warned before it is stored.

head.title: StadiaIcons – Privacy Policy
head.description: Keep your cookies, we have croissants!
